label: 延喜式
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: An early tenth century compilation of the rites, rules, and codes that regulated government proceedings in the Engi era (901-923) of the Heian period. The fifty volumes cover such topics as court ceremonies, etiquette, taxes, provincial government offices, and methods of tailoring and dyeing ceremonial garb.
